item.rnbrules.endlesscandy.tooltip: A rare candy that is packed with infinite energy. It will never be consumed, but cannot go past the level cap.
item.rnbrules.maxpartyrestore.tooltip: Revives, fully restores HP, PP and cures the entire party.
item.rnbrules.partyrestore.tooltip: Revives, fully restores HP, PP and cures the entire party.
item.rnbrules.pokelink.tooltip: A device that connects you to your PC from anywhere in the world.
item.rnbrules.scrollofwater.tooltip: Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of water.
item.rnbrules.scrollofdarkness.tooltip: Written upon it are the true secrets of the path of darkness.
item.rnbrules.megatransceiver.tooltip: Built from a conductive orb harvested from a Mega Ampharos' tail. Can communicate across continents.
item.rnbrules.maxcasing.tooltip: Shockproof and sterile. Built to contain extreme restorative energies safely.
item.rnbrules.maxhealingserum.tooltip: Synthesized from trace cells of Mew. Just a drop grants total restoration through pure genetic memory.
item.rnbrules.maxaerosolizer.tooltip: Disperses serum particles into a fine, pure healing mist. Remarkably efficient.
item.rnbrules.megagem.tooltip: A beautiful gem radiating energy. This gem can complete a Key Stone, allowing Mega Evolution to occur.
item.rnbrules.safaripass.tooltip: Grants entry to the Hoenn Safari Zone.
status.rnbrules.custommagmastorm: The heat makes it difficult to switch.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.catch_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec

Note: Pokemon in raids cannot check the pokeball. This is a pixelmon issue
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.catch_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.p:
The target pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.w:
Default: Wild and non wild pokemon are counted
True: Only wild pokemon
False: Only non wild pokemon
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.i: Whether to invert the target pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.u:
The source pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_pokemon.i: Whether to invert the source pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_trainer.g:
Default: Affects all trainers
True: Only gym leaders
False: Only non gym leaders
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_trainer.b: The boss tier of the trainer. Default is any.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_player.us: Optional. The name of the player to match against.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.defeat_player.uu: Optional. The UUID of the player to match against.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.hatch_egg.title: Hatch
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.hatch_egg.pokemo:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.hatch_egg.invert: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.trade_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.trade_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.evolve_pokemon.p:
The pokemon spec to match. In this case, the pokemon being evolved INTO.
So Ivysaur & Venasaur are fine, but not Bulbasaur.

Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.evolve_pokemon.i: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
The item that was used to evolve the pokemon. Optional. Only applicable for item interaction evolution.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.f: The filter to use for the pokedex. Leaving to ALL will count all pokemon in the pokedex.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.c:
True: Only count caught pokemon
False: Count seen and caught pokemon
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.t: The type of pokemon to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to TYPE.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.g: The minimum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
The maximum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.s: The specific pokemon to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to SPECIFIC POKEMON.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_amount.a:
True: Allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
False: Do not allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedex_percenta: The percentage of the pokedex that must be completed. 50% is 50.0, not 0.5
The filter to use for the pokedex. Leaving to ALL will count all pokemon in the pokedex.

True: Only count caught pokemon
False: Count seen and caught pokemon
The type of pokemon to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to TYPE.
The minimum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.
The maximum generation to count. Only applicable if you set the filter to GENERATION.

True: Allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
False: Do not allow pokemon that cannot be dexed to count towards the percentage
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedollars.amou: The amount of pokedollars to collect.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.pokedollars.cons:
True: Will consume the pokedollars on turn in
False: Will not consume the pokedollars on turn in
Default: Will obey the chapter setting
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.po:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.ca: The cause of the level up. Can be any, curry, rare candy, etc.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.level_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.atta: Optional. The move to use, in full lowercase english with underscores instead of spaces. If blank, will match any move.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.poke:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.inve: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_move.crit:
Default: Will trigger regardless of crit
True: Will only trigger on a critical hit
False: Will only trigger on a non-critical hit
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.item: The type of item to match.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.cust: The custom item to match. Only applicable if the item type is CUSTOM.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.poke:
The pokemon the item is used on. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.battle_item.inve: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.take_photo.title: Take Photo of
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.take_photo.pokem:

 - 'shiny type:water'

ftbquests.task.pixelmon.take_photo.ignor: Whether to ignore boss pokemon. If true, the task will ignore photos of boss pokemon

ftbquests.task.pixelmon.external_move.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.l: This will take pokemon from your %s
This check your %s for the pokemon
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.h:
Whether the submitted pokemon must have the same Original Trainer ID as the player. 

True - Requires the same
Default: Doesn't matter
False: Requires different OT.
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.p:
The pokemon spec to match. Can match species, type, ball, etc. Can be blank for any pokemon.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'shiny type:water'
 - 'legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.c: Note: This cannot be more than 1 if the pokemon is not consumed!
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.p: Where should the pokemon be taken from?
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.i: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.submit_pokemon.c: Whether the pokemon is actually removed from the player when the task is submitted. If false, the pokemon is only checked for.
Whether the submitted pokemon must have the same Original Trainer ID as the player. 

True - Requires the same
Default: Doesn't matter
False: Requires different OT.

Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
ftbquests.task.pixelmon.bring_pokemon.sl: The slot in the party to check for the pokemon.

ftbquests.task.pixelmon.bring_pokemon.in: Whether to invert the pokemon specification. If true, the task will match all pokemon EXCEPT the ones that match the specification
How far the player can be from the position on the X axis.
How far the player can be from the position on the Y axis.

If 0, the Y axis is ignored.
How far the player can be from the position on the Z axis.
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.title: %s Chest Drop
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.loot_: The loot tier of the chest. Higher tiers have better loot.
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.play_:
True: Will play the PokeLoot sound effect
False: Will not play nothing
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokeloot.toolt: Will drop a random item from a %s Chest when claimed
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokedollars.to: The amount of Pokedollars to give.
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokemon.spec.t:
The pokemon to give. Can have species, type, ball, original trainer, etc.

Examples:
 - 'species:Arcanine form:Hisuian'
 - 'random shiny type:water'
 - 'random legendary ball:master_ball'

For more information, see https://pixelmonmod.com/wiki/Pokemon_spec
ftbquests.reward.pixelmon.pokemon.shinyC: The 1 in X chance for the pokemon to be shiny. 0 is none, 100 is 1/100. Default is standard shiny rate (4096)
rnbrules.errors.invalid_spec.title: Invalid Pokemon Spec!
rnbrules.errors.invalid_spec.desc: An error occurred parsing that spec!
rnbrules.errors.pokemon_not_found.title: You do not have that pokemon!
rnbrules.errors.pokemon_not_found.desc: You cannot submit a pokemon you do not have!
